metadata.businessValue: Enables a Customer’s Meetings Production Team todeliver and support Teams Live Events. Provides a repeatable process fordelivering Live Events, preparing presenters for the experience, and providingtroubleshooting and support during events.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content:
Areyou looking to host Teams Live Events for your Corporate Enterprise? Do youneed to support a Virtual Conference?

Cyclotron has a focused program to train andsupport your Production Team to deliver Teams Live Events.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
Cyclotron has a three session Training Program focusedpreparing your team to run Teams Live Events:

*  Planning andTraining
*  Hands onExperience
*  Real Time Support

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: Cyclotron has supported multiple multi-nationalcorporations and professional organizations to deliver Teams Live Events. Oncetrained, these organizations have been able to support the ongoing delivery ofEvents with ease.
